WorkItem.Description:
Hello !  I  am a student from china.
when I use excel5 to read a .xls file , I get a exception!!
 
the code I use is:
$objReader = new PHPExcel_Reader_Excel5;
echo 1;
$excel = $objReader->load($path);
echo 1;
 
the ouput :
1
exception 'Exception' with message 'Unrecognized token 2C in formula' in Excel5.php:4303
 
could you help to solve my proble?
Thank you!!
 
PS: My English isn't very well !! 
Maybe I can't express my problem very clearly.
WorkItem.Summary: exception 'Unrecognized token 2C in formula' in Excel5.php

Comments.Message:
This appears to be the same bug as this:
http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=10623

Download PHPExcel 1.7.1 or latest source code:
http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/SourceControl/list/changesets
